about.title: About TripCalc
about.mission: TripCalc was created to answer a simple question most travel websites can't: How much does a trip really cost?

difference.title: Why TripCalc?
difference.description: Most travel sites focus on inspiration, hotels, and attractions. TripCalc focuses on something more practical: real-world numbers, real traveler decisions, and real costs — based on experience, not generic averages.

realExperience.title: Built from Real Experience
realExperience.description: TripCalc is not a generic travel blog. It's built using:

points.3: Real-world testing of transport, ATMs, SIMs, and daily expenses
points.4: Data collected and refined over time

whatYouCanDo.title: What You Can Do with TripCalc

points.1: Estimate the real daily cost of a trip
points.2: Compare transportation options with real prices
points.4: Understand tips, fees, and hidden costs
points.6: Make smarter budgeting decisions before and during a trip

community.title: Growing with the Community
community.description: TripCalc is designed to grow gradually:

points.1: Starting with a few cities and core calculators
points.2: Expanding with better data over time

about.finalMessage: TripCalc helps you plan with confidence by turning travel into numbers you can actually use.

footer.tagline: Because travelers deserve tools, not just inspiration.
